dialogue.speaker: felix
dialogue.dialogue_line: oh, you must be here for the pilgrimage...

dialogue.speaker: felix
dialogue.dialogue_line: head down the path to town and they'll get you all sorted

dialogue.speaker: felix
dialogue.dialogue_line: but make sure to be careful, i think some of the path might be blocked

dialogue.speaker: felix
dialogue.dialogue_line: you might want to go talk to zahir, the shrine keeper, he might be able to help you out
